name: perchance-helper
description: A Blackbox extension for helping with Perchance.org coding, including creating Perchance lists and generating HTML structures for generators.

tools.name: create_perchance_list
tools.description: Creates a Perchance list syntax with the given items and optional weights.

name.description: The name of the list variable (e.g., 'colors')

items.description: Array of items for the list (e.g., ['red', 'blue', 'green'])

weights.description: Optional weights for each item. If provided, must match the length of items (e.g., [1, 2, 1])

tools.name: generate_perchance_html
tools.description: Generates basic HTML structure for a Perchance generator page, including scripts to display random outputs.

title.description: Title for the HTML page (e.g., 'Random Name Generator')

lists.description: Array of list variable names to include and randomize (e.g., ['firstNames', 'lastNames'])

prompts.name: perchance_list_tutorial
prompts.description: Provides a tutorial and examples for creating Perchance lists

arguments.name: list_type
arguments.description: Type of list to show examples for (e.g., 'simple', 'weighted', 'nested')

prompts.name: perchance_html_template
prompts.description: Provides HTML templates for Perchance generators with best practices

resources.name: Perchance Documentation
resources.description: Summarized Perchance.org documentation and syntax reference

resources.name: Perchance Examples
resources.description: Common examples and patterns for Perchance coding
